description: Simulated using FiPy.

description: Structured adaptive mesh refinement - phase-field simulation of dendritic growth during solidification. (Image courtesy of Chin Yi Chee at IHPC)
title: SAMR, phase-field simulation of dendritic growth

description: The phase field resulting from a simulation of the complex Ginzburg-Landau equation. Several frames from a 100 x 100 domain with 512x512 grid points. See Target waves in the complex Ginzburg-Landau equation, Phys. Rev. E 62, 7627-7631 (2000)
title: Ginzburg-Landau Equation

description: Simulation of directional solidification of a Succinonitrile-Acetone alloy using the phase-field method (see Chapter 8). The simulation uses an adaptive grid that follows the solid-sliquid interface. (with Nik Provatas)
title: Phase-field simulation of binary alloy solidification

description: Steady-state localized solutions of the conserved Swift-Hohenberg (or phase-field crystal) equation. For details see U. Thiele, A. J. Archer, M. J. Robbins, H. Gomez and E. Knobloch, Phys. Rev. E 87, 042915 (2013).
title: Localized solutions of the phase-field crystal equation

description: Phase-Field Simulation of Solidification (Collaborator: Prof. Christoph Beckermann, University of Iowa)
title: Solidification Simulation

description: Poly crystalline phase field simulation in MOOSE. Thousands of grains are represented with just over a dozen phase field order parameters.
title: MOOSE -- GrainTracker order parameter remapping system
